TextView.android:text:
Objective:
Get a hand value closer to 21 than the dealer without going over.

 Card Values:
 Numbered cards: Face value
 Face cards (Jack, Queen, King): 10 points each
 Aces: 1 or 11 points

 Gameplay:
 1. Receive two cards.
 2. Improve your hand by drawing cards (hit). .
 3. Options: .
.
 Stand: Keep current hand. .
 Hit: Draw an extra card. .
 Double Down: Double the bet, get one more card, and stand. .
 Split: If first two cards are equal, split into two hands. .
.
 Dealer Rules: .
 Draw until 17 or higher, then stand. .
.
 Bust: .
 Exceeding 21 points results in a loss. .
.
 Winning: .
 Closer to 21 than the dealer without going over. .
 Player wins if dealer busts. .
.
 Blackjack: .
 Ace and a 10-point card. .
 Often wins extra unless the dealer also has Blackjack. .
